subject: Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Art Rooney II, the Pittsburgh Steelers’ president, said he and his father, Dan Rooney, were looking for additional partners. The Rooneys are seeking investors so they can buy shares from Dan Rooney’s brothers that would separate the Steelers from the family’s interest in racetrack casino operations and satisfy N.F.L. rules regarding ownership equity. steelers.
